tool.name: todo_read
tool.description:
Read the current todo list. Returns all todos with their status and content.
Todos are stored in .mcp/todos.json in the project root.
Status values: - pending: Not yet started - in_progress: Currently being worked on - completed: Finished successfully - cancelled: No longer needed

returns.field: Stats: total, pending, in_progress, completed, cancelled

tool.name: todo_write
tool.description:
Replace the entire todo list with a new list.
Each todo must have: id, content, status. Use this for bulk updates or replacing the entire list.

parameters.parameter: Array of todo objects. Each object must have: - id: Unique identifier (string) - content: Todo description (string) - status: One of "pending", "in_progress", "completed", "cancelled" - priority: Optional priority number (default 0)

tool.name: todo_add
tool.description: Add a single todo to the list. The ID must be unique - duplicates will be rejected.

parameters.parameter: Initial status. Default is "pending". Valid values: pending, in_progress, completed, cancelled

tool.name: todo_update
tool.description: Update a single todo by ID. Only updates the fields that are provided.

parameters.parameter: ID of the todo to update
New status (optional) Valid values: pending, in_progress, completed, cancelled
